                       @NonNull

        remote - the remote address
        username - the username
        password - the password
        trustedCertStore - the certificate store to verify the server's public key.

      • debugBlock

        public hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.Observable<AdvanceBlockDiagnostic> debugBlock(String realm,
                                                                               String blockId)
                                                                                 throws IOException,
                                                                                        AdvanceControlException
        Ask for the observable sequence of block diagnostic messages for the given block within the given realm.

        Remark: registering to this observable starts the HTTP message exchange and receives the records in the caller's thread. Consider using the Reactive.registerOn(Observable, hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Scheduler)

        Specified by:
        debugBlock in interface AdvanceEngineControl
        Parameters:
        realm - the realm
        blockId - the block unique identifier (as in the flow)
        Returns:
        the observable for the diagnostic messages
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        AdvanceControlException - if the user is not allowed to debug in the realm or the block is missing

      • debugParameter

        public hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.Observable<AdvanceParameterDiagnostic> debugParameter(String realm,
                                                                                       String blockId,
                                                                                       String port)
                                                                                         throws IOException,
                                                                                                AdvanceControlException
        Ask for the observable sequence of port messages of the given port/block/realm.

        Remark: registering to this observable starts the HTTP message exchange and receives the records in the caller's thread. Consider using the Reactive.registerOn(Observable, hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Scheduler)

        Specified by:
        debugParameter in interface AdvanceEngineControl
        Parameters:
        realm - the realm
        blockId - the block unique identifier (as in the flow)
        port - the port name
        Returns:
        the observable of parameter messages
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        AdvanceControlException - if the user is not allowed to debug in the realm or the referenced parameter is missing

      • queryCompilationResult

        public AdvanceCompilationResult queryCompilationResult(String realm)
                                                throws IOException,
                                                       AdvanceControlException
        Description copied from interface: AdvanceEngineControl
        Return the compilation result of the given realm. This function may be used to find out why a server-side verification failed or to query the compilation result after a flow upload and realm startup.
        Specified by:
        queryCompilationResult in interface AdvanceEngineControl
        Parameters:
        realm - the realm to query
        Returns:
        the compilation result or null if no compilation was performed since the last startup of the engine
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurs
        AdvanceControlException - if the user is not allowed to read a flow
